part.name: The Book
part.info: Rescue Lynren the paladin, who is imprisoned in Moroch Temple, by locating her book of holy word in her home in Asteria, among the various temples, and bringing the book to her.

dialog.name: areyou
dialog.message: Yes, that is my name... Lynren the paladin...

dialog.name: whyhere
dialog.message: I have set out on a mission to destroy all evil, and set this evil place as my first target... But I was overpowered and my magics were subdued by the evil magicians here...

response.message: Is there anything I can do to help?

dialog.name: dohelp
dialog.message: Well... You could visit my home in Asteria among the various temples, and bring me my book of holy word... The holy word prayer should work to set me free... Would you do this for me?

dialog.name: iwill
dialog.message: Excellent! Please make haste and bring me my book of holy word from my home.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Have you got my book of holy word yet? You can find the book at my home in Asteria, among the various temples... Please make haste.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Have you got my book of holy word yet? You can find the book at my home in Asteria, among the various temples... Please make haste.

dialog.name: herego
dialog.message: Splendid! Alright, let me have a look that book...
Normally, holy word is used to cause mass damage to undead creatures. However, this book contains a variation of the prayer, with a ritual, which allows one to break even the darkest magics.
This is what you have to do...

dialog.name: perform
dialog.message: You use the variation of the holy word prayer to free Lynren the paladin from her imprisonment.
Lynren says: Thank you, thank you! I hope to meet you again once more... For now, farewell!
Moments after Lynren vanishes, some sparkling gold coins materialize in your hand out of nowhere...
